message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. I believe it could be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $120?
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the description of your product, but $120 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $80 for it.  What do you think?
I understand your budget, Bob. Let me see if we can find common ground. How about we meet in the middle at $95 for the product?
Alice, $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but $85 is the absolute maximum I can offer.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Considering your budget, I'm willing to lower the price to $90 for the product. This is the best offer I can make.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $90 is still a bit out of my price range. I'm sticking to my offer of $85.  If we can't agree on that, I'll have to go with John's offer.
